PGSSLMODE.description: If you use Heroku to deploy Postgres (or use self-signed certs for Postgres) then put 'no-verify' here.

NEXT_PUBLIC_WEBAPP_URL.description: Replace HEROKU_APP_NAME with the name given to your app

CALENDSO_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Application Key for symmetric encryption and decryption. Must be 32 bytes for AES256 encryption algorithm.

NEXTAUTH_URL.description: Replace HEROKU_APP_NAME with the name given to your app

CRON_ENABLE_APP_SYNC.description: Whether to automatically keep app metadata in the database in sync with the metadata/config files. When disabled, the sync runs in a reporting-only dry-run mode.

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: Sendgrid api key. Used for email reminders in workflows

SENDGRID_EMAIL.description: Sendgrid email. Used for email reminders in workflows

EMAIL_FROM.description: Configures the global From: header whilst sending emails

EMAIL_SERVER_HOST.description: Configures the global SMTP server host

EMAIL_SERVER_PORT.description: Configures the global SMTP server port

EMAIL_SERVER_USER.description: Configures the global SMTP server user

EMAIL_SERVER_PASSWORD.description: Configures the global SMTP server password

NEXT_PUBLIC_TEAM_IMPERSONATION.description: Set the following value to true if you wish to enable Team Impersonation

NEXT_PUBLIC_AVAILABILITY_SCHEDULE_INTERV.description: Control time intervals on a user's Schedule availability

scripts.postdeploy: cd packages/prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy
